metadata.title: Impact of S Cache use on RA Family MCU Certified CoreMark Results

sections.content: Some RA Family MCUs (some Cortex-M33 devices) have a system level cache for both data and instructions that can improve program performance.
The CoreMark tests for these MCUs were done using the S Cache, so the measured results may be higher than those found when running the benchmark code without the S Cache enabled.
The below application note details the guidelines when using the S Cache.  Sample code is also available and shows the performance improvements possible when the S Cache is used.

Suitable Products
RA and FSP
  source: https://www.renesas.com/sg/en/document/apn/ra-family-guidelines-using-s-cache-system-bus

Suitable Products
RA and FSP
